mixes.name: Animal Crossing Wild World Mix
mixes.description: This is a collection of all the hourly themes from this classic Animal Crossing soundtrack. It starts in the night time, so get excited for those unique cozy nighttime vibes

mixes.name: Animal Crossing New Leaf Mix
mixes.description: Animal Crossing New Leaf really changed the vibe when it comes to the hourly themes. Richer, more lush, the loops twice as long. A special kind of vibe that we must cherish

mixes.name: ARMS Mix
mixes.description: Lowkey ARMS has a great soundtrack. That legendary main theme and the various stages are all represented in this mix. Credits theme also a banger

mixes.name: Cadence of Hyrule Mix
mixes.description: The moment I heard the Tal Tal Heights theme in the Cadence of Hyrule trailer I jizzed my pants. Then I learn that the main overworld theme is an incredible four minute loop combining four different classic zelda overworld themes? I had to make a mix. There are a ton of other great classic tracks, but also original tracks. I admit, having listened to this mix a bunch I kind of regret putting in the original dungeon themes. With the exception of Hyrule Castle I don't think they really slap like the other ones

mixes.name: Celeste Mix
mixes.description: Beloved indie darling Celeste deserves its own mix. Of course you can just listen to the original soundtrack on Spotify but I wanted to have the tracks transition into each other nicely and that's exactly what this is. Looking back I actually prefer the Farewell DLC music more, and that sadly isn't present in this mix

mixes.name: Dandara Mix
mixes.description: Dandara is an obscure indie game that I loved with a mind-blowing soundtrack. About 5 minutes into this mix is the incredible boss theme. Let it bless your ears and then get blown away by the FINAL boss theme at the end. Holy moly
